add_library(wxWidgets_base SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_core SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_regex SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_jpeg SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_tiff SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_png SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_zlib SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_propgrid SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_adv SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_xml SHARED IMPORTED)
#add_library(wxWidgets_libwxexpat SHARED IMPORTED)
add_library(wxWidgets_net SHARED IMPORTED)

set_target_properties(wxWidgets_base PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_baseu-3.3.so")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_core PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_gtk3u_core-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_regex PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_regexu-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_jpeg PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_jpeg-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_tiff PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_tiff-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_png PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_png-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_zlib PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_zlib-3.3.so")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_propgrid PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_gtk3u_propgrid-3.3.so")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_adv PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_gtk3u_adv-3.3.so")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_xml PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_baseu_xml-3.3.so")
#set_target_properties(wxWidgets_libwxexpat PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_expat-3.3.so")
set_target_properties(wxWidgets_net PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/wxWidgets/libwx_baseu_net-3.3.so")
